column18: 10/02/2016: Assailants opened fire at a campaign rally for Irakli Okruashvili, an independent candidate, in Gori, Shida Kartli, Georgia. Two people were injured in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.

column18: 10/17/2016: An explosive device detonated prematurely outside a television and radio station in Sokhumi, Abkhazia, Georgia. The assailant was killed in the blast. No group claimed responsibility for the incident; however, sources attributed the attack to the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).
column58: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL)
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources suspected that the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) may have carried out the attack in retaliation for Russia's military involvement in Syria.
column108: Unspecified property was damaged in this attack.
column132: 2016.\",\"\"\"Abkhazian president says too early to label explosion outside Abkhazian state TV and radio company's Sukhum office terror attack"

column17: The incident occurred in the Marneuli district.
column18: 10/19/2017: Assailants opened fire on the Georgian Dream - Democratic Georgia campaign headquarters in Kizilajlo, Kvemo Kartli, Georgia. At least five people, including municipal candidate Jeyhun Chovdarov, were injured in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources stated that the attack occurred two days before the Marneuli municipal elections were scheduled to take place.
column108: A headquarters was damaged in this attack.
column125: There is doubt that this incident meets terrorism-related criteria. Sources suspected that the attack was related to intra-party rivalry, though Georgian Dream officials denied this claim. The victims included Azad Chobanov, Vugar Bayramov, Anar Mamishov, and Elmar Huseynov.
